channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: The digital world is a promising, yet perplexing, place to evangelize. Today, Ryan Penney and a panel of diverse Catholic guests tell us how they work to spread their faith online. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: To Serve Is To Reign
channel.desc: Find how baptism opens the doors to Holiness, a universal call to sanctity beyond individual vocations, that aims to get us to Heaven with the support of the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: God gave us the 10 Commandments to love and serve him by. Jesus spoke about two of them that are greater, and will help us fulfill the rest. Discover the blessings that come to every life when we obey the commandments. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: When their sea friends gather for a great adventure, Lukas and Noah share the story of St. Teresa of Calcutta. Mother Teresa?s example shows them how they can have a big heart, and commit acts of love every day. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary For Kids
channel.desc: The Little Angel leads kids through the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from Jesus' first Miracle at Cana to the Institution of the Eucharist at the Last Supper. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Heart Speaks To Heart From Heaven: The Newman Miracle Story
channel.desc: The life and miraculous intercession of Blessed John Henry Newman, and the Newman conference, where Deacon Jack Sullivan gave his testimony of healing through Newman's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Bobby Angel discusses recovering wisdom and truth so to break out of the ever-present postmodernism in order to rebuild our culture and spark a holy reform of thinking and ideas. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Jubilee Mass
channel.desc: (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the idea that our deepest yearnings are put there by God due to His great love for us. He wants us to learn to love Him as much as He love us, impossible though that may be. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: Similar to how ancient civilizations often used myths to explain the world, Dr. Kreeft and Dr. Howard examine how the writings of CS Lewis and JRR Tolkien can help us obtain a better understanding of God and the world He created. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: These families show how to build a family culture that helps each member feel they like truly belong. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Bobby Angel discusses recovering wisdom and truth so to break out of the ever-present postmodernism in order to rebuild our culture and spark a holy reform of thinking and ideas. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Dive deeply into Mary?s Fiat and constant intercession for the pilgrim Church and know the power behind the Holy Rosary, Brown Scapular, and other devotions to our Blessed Mother. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. Mark and the Franciscan Friars of the Eternal Word are back. Interviews, spiritual insights from the friars, music videos and much more. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug discuss the differences in the truths of Scripture and science and how they are merely a difference in perspective of the same reality and not contradictory,. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Perou : Les Huit Meres
channel.desc: Au d?but des ann?es 1980, une organisation r?volutionnaire communiste appel?e Sendero Luminoso ? Sentier lumineux ? a lanc? une op?ration terroriste brutale dans les r?gions rurales des Andes p?ruviennes, utilisant la terreur sans piti?. L'arm?e envoy?e pour combattre le groupe terroriste a ?galement fait un usage excessif de la force, d?truisant des villages et tuant de nombreux civils innocents. En 2003, ? la fin de 20 ans d'insurrection, plus de 70 000 personnes ?taient mortes ou avaient disparu. Encore aujourd'hui, les traumatismes occasionn?s par ce conflit affectent profond?ment la vie quotidienne du peuple p?ruvien. La Congr?gation des S?urs missionnaires de J?sus Verbe et Victime apporte soins et r?confort ? ces r?gions ?loign?es. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains Biblical proof for the Pope as Christ?s Vicar on earth. Also meet retired Air Force Brigadier General Robert Yates, Dr. Cameron Thompson, and Alexandre Havard. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Bishop Frederic Baraga
channel.desc: Trekking across Michigan?s wilderness earned him the nickname ?the Snowshoe Priest,? but his heroic virtue bringing the Gospel to Native Americans and immigrant miners may earn Bishop Frederic Baraga sainthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Holy Mass On The Feast Of St. John Henry Newman
channel.desc: From Walsingham, England, celebrate the Holy Mass honoring St. John Henry Newman on his feast day. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Heartbeat Of My Soul
channel.desc: Learn what it takes to become a priest in this revealing visit to St. Francis de Sales academy. Seminarians and alumnI share their individual stories, their commitment to serving Christ and their hopes for the future. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Mass recalling the death of Christ daily, why we are not all saved ahead of time like Mary, and Mary not having other children besides Jesus. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Images Of Mary
channel.desc: Mary, the Mother of God who sacrifices for her Divine Son. She is able to detach herself from her Son whom she loves so much. Once again, she trusts God to take care of everything. We need to follow her example. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother assures us that God calls us ultimately not to be His servant, but to be His friends. Next to Him, we have a friend in Mary as well. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Today, author Jim Papandrea joins Johnnette Williams to share some fascinating insight from his amazing new book on the holy rosary, its history, its wonder and the amazing truths it expresses through its mysteries. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough speaks with Sam Baker, founder of Catholic Man UK, about the challenges facing men and the necessity of men supporting one another in the faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert Pergolesi?s Stabat Mater
channel.desc: A concert performance of Giovanni Battista Pergolesi?s musical masterpiece depicting Mary?s suffering as Jesus died on the cross. From the Church of Our Lady in Dresden, Germany. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Bishop Sheen describes various identity problems and shows that only in Christ can one find his or her true identity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Images Of Mary
channel.desc: The perpetual Virginity of Mary is a doctrine of the Church. Never did she bear any other children and Christ was conceived by the Holy Spirit. Mary's virginity remained after giving birth to Jesus. Her mind and heart were also kept pure. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Today?s guest, Jim Papandrea, is back to uncover the hidden gems of the Rosary, and show how to dispel the misconceptions and overcome the discomforts that have led some to steer clear of this Christocentric prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: Pilgrims in the Holy Land seek the place where the child in Elizabeth?s womb jumped for joy at the visit of the pregnant Mary. This is the Second Joyful Mystery glorifying God, who worked the most sublime miracle in her. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: The life of St. Francis of Assisi from care-free youth to his conversion and radical embracement of poverty for the love of God. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Meet the Donut Man, Fr. Joe, and the kids who work in the Massterpiece Donut Shop as they discover the amazing Massterpiece Machine that helps them learn all about the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica explains the difference between natural hope and supernatural hope. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: A condensed version of the EWTN series documenting the astounding miracles at Fatima, where Lucia dos Santos and her cousins, Francisco and Jacinta, were visited by the Blessed Mother in a series of apparitions. (90 minutes).

channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy welcome author Rosemary Mcguire Berry to the show to speak about the ways in which our unique personalities are gifts from God, and meant for our own sanctification. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Explore the St. Augustine?s National Shrine of Our Lady of La Leche, the oldest Marian Shrine in the US and the location of the first Mass celebrated on US soil. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford uses the play Pymalion to explain the concept of faith. The Lord living in me allows me to learn to accept that He really loves me and then I can learn to love Him. Learning to love God is based solely on faith. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: La Passion De Sainte Jeanne D?arc
channel.desc: A documentary on the Maid of Orleans released on the centennial of her canonization. St. Joan of Arc carried out her heroic mission with absolute confidence in God?s will, giving up her own life at only 19 years of age. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Originally from the Dominican Republic, Elbyn Mustafa wandered away from the faith during college, but thanks to God?s grace came home to the Church through Reconciliation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother shares the story of Zacchaeus' encounter with Jesus, an example showing how some people may have a lot of knowledge but very little in knowing God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Our Lady Of The Pillar
channel.desc: Ordinary life is the perfect place for extraordinary things to happen, as seen in this inspiring story of the Blessed Mother?s intercessory prayers for James the Apostle, and for a college student diagnosed with cancer. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: In Liberia, a country founded as a refuge for freed slaves, the Catholic Church supports healing through education, healthcare and faith initiatives despite many challenges. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Author of ?Holy Silence: A Practical Guide to Recollection in God,? Fr. Basil Nortz discusses the supernatural powers at work in the world and how to practice holy silence daily. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: One of the greatest problems today is one of identity. People have lost sight of who they are, why they were created by God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Long-time friend of Mother Teresa, Susan Conroy examines what we can learn from the life of Mother Teresa about the virtue of faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: How can you ensure your college students stay faithful while they?re away from home? Young priests with a successful campus ministry share their secrets for reaching today?s teens. (60 minutes).

channel.title: new! Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: Sixties radical Saul Alinsky takes on Catholic bellwether Archbishop Fulton Sheen in this battle of competing philosophies between two giants who spoke passionately for their time. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Leo is joined by trained chefs Jacob Jones and Randall Edwards to prepare a special meal that will make anyone feel homesick. But this meal is nothing compared to the one we will have when we are welcomed into heaven. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA

channel.desc: In part 1 of their enlightening discussion, Sister Maria Catherine Toon and Father Brad Elliott talk about life?s biggest questions and the promise of the Christian story. Learn how we all can become restored in Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Bishop Sheen shows what it means to be a true lady and a real gentleman. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Images Of Mary
channel.desc: The Immaculate Conception of Mary. She is the only human being, other than Christ, without original sin. She was immaculately conceived so that she could be a perfect tabernacle for Jesus. Christ deserves a pure heart like Mary's. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Sr. Patricia tells story of St. Isaac Jogues, who in 17th century Canada, baptized many Native Americans and helped them convert to Catholicism. She guides the children in imitating those saintly efforts in their lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Delve deeper into the truth found in history's most amazing stories. Today, it?s Jonathan Swift's ?Gulliver?s Travels,? Jane Austen's ?Sense and Sensibility? and ?Pride and Prejudice? and Mary Shelley's ?Frankenstein.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: In his new book, Archbishop Alfred C. Hughes outlines thirteen Christian spiritual classics that illustrate the ordinary steps we can take toward living the Gospel life more fully. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer continues his discussion of the "Four Levels of Success" and the impact the levels can have on personal and professional lives. Level four comes with a surrender to God in the form of a "Thy will be done" perspective. (30 minutes).
